p: Tetrahydrocurcuminoids (THCs), the natural antioxidants, identified as the major metabolites of curcuminoids, consist of tetrahydrocurcumin (THC), tetrahydrodemethoxycurcumin (THDMC), and tetrahydrobisdemethoxycurcumin (THBDMC) ( Figure 1), exhibiting similar physiological and pharmacological properties of curcumin [ 13].
